.. _literature-review-notes:

Literature Review Notes
=======================

.. note::
   This is the collection of my thoughts and summarizations of research papers.  The actual papers, with annotations, are tracked using Mendeley. This is meant to just be a quick, high level reference to the paper's content.

   General Format:
    * First Author - Title
    * DOI
    * Notes
    * Takeaways


.. toctree::
   :includehidden:
   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:

   lit-review/autonomy
   lit-review/human-robot-interaction
   lit-review/human-factors
   lit-review/dynamics-and-controls
   lit-review/machine-learning
